subject: FOUND IT! AF ignoring isActive filter completely
body:
Team,

Ran Ben's diagnostics. FOUND THE BUG:

## DIAGNOSTIC: Query with isActive=FALSE
| System | isActive=false result |
|--------|----------------------|
| Express | 2 (correct - only 2 inactive events) |
| AF TEST | 346 (WRONG - ignoring filter!) |

AF returns 346 events whether isActive=true OR isActive=false.

## THE BUG
AF is NOT applying the isActive filter at all. It's returning ALL events (346) regardless of the isActive parameter.

But wait - Express has 384 total active. So we're still missing events.

## Possible double bug:
1. AF isActive filter not working
2. AF also not getting all events from DB

Express active=true: 384
Express active=false: 2
Express total: 386

AF any filter: 346

Fulton - Check your isActive filter implementation!

- Sarah
